channel.title: How To Make Shops!
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hello And Welcome To My First Tutorial[/size]
[size=12pt]How To Make Shops By Ipkudown[/size]
first go to your shops.cfg and you will see like this
[code=java]shop = 21 Shield Shop 2 2 1173 10 1175 10 1177 10 1179 10 1181 10 1183 10 1185 10 1189 10 1191 10 1193 10 1195 10 1197 10 1199 10 1201 10 1540 10[/code]
shop = 21 is shop number
shield shop = shop name
2 2 = if you can sell back items to the shop
1173 = item id 10 = amount
another example
[code=java]shop = @@ !!!! $$$ $$$ *** &&&[/code]
@@ = shop number !!!! = shop name $$$ = if you can sell back items *** = item id &&& = amount
k now you make that shop but you need to make it with npc go back to your client.java ( soruce files ).
and Search (CTRL+F) zeke
you will some thing like this
[code=java] else if (NPCID == 681) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 21; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop }[/code]
Explain
[code=java]else if (NPCID == 681) {[/code]
that mean if you trade with zeke
[code=java]PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 21; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop }[/code]
that mean he open shop that you make it
now after [code]}[/code]
add this
[code=java] else if (NPCID == ####) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = @@@@; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop }[/code]
#### = npc id
@@@@ = shop number
hope i helped
thanks for reading
enjoy!!

but… … … this is a thing everyone knows + that this is about the 150th tut on how to do it… so it’s unneeded

item.title: How To Make Shops!
item.dc:creator: @ipkudown ipkudown
item.description:
@ipkudown wrote:

[size=14pt]Hello And Welcome To My First Tutorial[/size]

                 [size=12pt]How To Make Shops By Ipkudown[/size]

first go to your shops.cfg and you will see like this

shop = 21	Shield Shop	2	2	1173	10	1175	10	1177	10	1179	10	1181	10	1183	10	1185	10	1189	10	1191	10	1193	10	1195	10	1197	10	1199	10	1201	10	1540	10

shop = 21 is shop number

shield shop = shop name

2 2 = if you can sell back items to the shop

1173 = item id
10 = amount

another example

shop = @@	!!!!	$$$	$$$	***	&&&

@@ = shop number
!!! = shop name
$$$ = if you can sell back items
*** = item id
&&& = amount

k now you make that shop but you need to make it with npc
go back to your client.java ( soruce files ).

and Search (CTRL+F) zeke

you will some thing like this

else if (NPCID == 681) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 21; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop }

Explain

else if (NPCID == 681) {

that mean if you trade with zeke

			[code=java]PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 21; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop

}[/code]

that mean he open shop that you make it

now after

}

add this

else if (NPCID == ####) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = @@@@; // Al-Kharid Scimitar Shop }

= npc id

@@@@ = shop number

hope i helped

thanks for reading

enjoy!!

Read full topic
